String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: How do you know the scene hasn't been tampered with?
String.Dest: 你们怎么能确保现在看到的这些没有被篡改过。

String.Source: It's a deal, boot. This journal needs to have the name Asteria added to it.
String.Dest: 我这有个活儿给你，臭皮袋。这个本子里的名单要加上一个“阿斯特里亚”。

String.Source: It's a deal, boot. This journal needs to have the name Asteria added to it.
String.Dest: 我这有个活儿给你，臭皮袋。这个本子里的名单要加上一个“阿斯特里亚”。

String.Source: Rumarin just pretends to be rotten. He wants to see you safe as much as I do.
String.Dest: 罗米勒可是刀子嘴豆腐心。他其实跟我一样希望看到你安全呢。

String.Source: Rumarin just pretends to be rotten. He wants to see you safe as much as I do.
String.Dest: 罗米勒可是刀子嘴豆腐心。他其实跟我一样希望看到你安全呢。

String.Source: Rumarin just pretends to be rotten. He wants to see you safe as much as I do.
String.Dest: 罗米勒可是刀子嘴豆腐心。他其实跟我一样希望看到你安全呢。

String.Source: Sensible? Decent? Clearly you have me mistaken for an idiot.
String.Dest: 同情？好人？你这话是把我当白痴哄啊。

String.Source: Sensible? Decent? Clearly you have me mistaken for an idiot.
String.Dest: 同情？好人？你这话是把我当白痴哄啊。

String.Source: Sensible? Decent? Clearly you have me mistaken for an idiot.
String.Dest: 同情？好人？你这话是把我当白痴哄啊。

String.Source: Sensible? Decent? Clearly you have me mistaken for an idiot.
String.Dest: 同情？好人？你这话是把我当白痴哄啊。

String.Source: I don't have to do anything. Not unless you agree to do a forgery for me.
String.Dest: 我可没必要帮你什么，除非你愿意帮我伪造一件东西。

String.Source: I don't have to do anything. Not unless you agree to do a forgery for me.
String.Dest: 我可没必要帮你什么，除非你愿意帮我伪造一件东西。

String.Source: I don't have to do anything. Not unless you agree to do a forgery for me.
String.Dest: 我可没必要帮你什么，除非你愿意帮我伪造一件东西。

String.Source: Yes, come with me, back to my bandit camp.
String.Dest: 是的，跟我来，回我的强盗营地去。

String.Source: Yes, come with me, back to my bandit camp.
String.Dest: 是的，跟我来，回我的强盗营地去。

String.Source: Yes, come with me, back to my bandit camp.
String.Dest: 是的，跟我来，回我的强盗营地去。

String.Source: Don't worry, I have every intention of rescuing you. I need a favor, however.
String.Dest: 别担心，我是真心实意地来救你。同时也需要你帮个忙呢。

String.Source: Don't worry, I have every intention of rescuing you. I need a favor, however.
String.Dest: 别担心，我是真心实意地来救你。同时也需要你帮个忙呢。

String.Source: Don't worry, I have every intention of rescuing you. I need a favor, however.
String.Dest: 别担心，我是真心实意地来救你。同时也需要你帮个忙呢。

String.Source: Can you mimic this bard's handwriting? The last name should be Asteria.
String.Dest: 你能模仿这个吟游诗人的笔迹吗？这份名单的最后一个名字要改成阿斯特里亚。

String.Source: Can you mimic this bard's handwriting? The last name should be Asteria.
String.Dest: 你能模仿这个吟游诗人的笔迹吗？这份名单的最后一个名字要改成阿斯特里亚。

String.Source: Yes, I will do anything you ask, we just need to get my things! They should be in a cabin somewhere nearby.
String.Dest: 是的，一切听您吩咐，只要先去把我的东西拿回来！应该就在这附近的某间小木屋里。

String.Source: The bandits, they were having me write bounty letters for a vigilante that was killing their men, which they would take to the inn dressed as guards.
String.Dest: 那些死强盗，他们非让我写下对一个警戒者——他们的老冤家——的通缉令，打算乔装成守卫拿去发布到酒馆里。

String.Source: If he wanted to see me safe, he would've paid up on his debt. But I always pay on time, and many times, in advance!
String.Dest: 他要是想看到我安然无恙，就该早点把欠我的钱还上。而我一直按时付账，很多时候甚至是提前付款！

String.Source: If you take me to the cabin they have nearby, I will show you. They always blindfold me, but it is around here somewhere. Please, I beg you!
String.Dest: 要是你能带我去他们这附近的那个小屋，我就能办到。他们总是蒙住我的眼睛，但一定是这附近的什么地方。求你了！

String.Source: Look, I-I didn't tell them anything! I'm just a passing peddler, I don't even know why they're keeping me alive!
String.Dest: 您瞧，我什么都没跟他们说！我只是个路过的小贩，我甚至连他们为什么留我的活口都不知道！

String.Source: Now where is my satchel? Ah, there it is. I'm sure my tools are still inside. No one ever checks the secret compartment.
String.Dest: 我的小包包在哪儿呢？噢，在这儿。我敢肯定我的工具还在里边。谁也不可能发现这个暗格。

String.Source: They always blindfold me when they move me back and forth, but I know it isn't very far from here.
String.Dest: 他们在转移我的时候始终蒙着我的眼睛，不过我知道那离这儿不远。

String.Source: They always blindfold me when they move me back and forth, but I know it isn't very far from here.
String.Dest: 他们在转移我的时候始终蒙着我的眼睛，不过我知道那离这儿不远。

String.Source: So, we don't want to boast about Asteria's voice too much. No offense, but what if she isn't very good?
String.Dest: 那么，咱就别在阿斯特里亚的嗓音上吹得太过了。没别的意思啊，只是万一她声音没那么出众怎么办？

String.Source: Then perhaps you are a mortal who appreciates coin. I can do many things with a quill and ink. I can make you a Thane, or even a bard!
String.Dest: 那看来你是个认钱的主儿。我能用羽毛和墨水做很多事情。我可以让你当上领主，甚至是吟遊诗人！

String.Source: Rumarin? What are you doing here?
String.Dest: 罗米勒？你怎么来了？

String.Source: I think, and this is just my opinion, but we ought to maybe appeal to other things, like cost and availability.
String.Dest: 我想呢，只是我个人看法啊，不如给他扯到其他方面的优点去，比如费用啊档期什么的。

String.Source: T-that's right, and if you paid on time, I wouldn't have to take jobs like this!
String.Dest: 那……倒是，可你要是及时付了钱，我就不会沦落到接这种活儿的地步啊！

String.Source: There is a cabin nearby, with a bed! You can let me live and work there. The bandits would take me there to make bounty letters.
String.Dest: 附近有个小屋，有张床的！你可以让我住那儿干活。强盗们常把我带到那儿写绑票信。

String.Source: Not many people can find the place, to be honest, since it's not on any map.
String.Dest: 说实话，没多少人能找到这个地方。因为那里在任何一份地图上都没有标示。

String.Source: Kynesgrove sounds like the perfect watering hole for me. I don't want to get caught up in whatever you're planning.
String.Dest: 我觉得凯娜之林听起来就是个不错的酒吧。不管你们是打算搞什么鬼我都不想被牵连进去。

String.Source: Yes, I can do that! It will be as if this person penned it with his own hand!
String.Dest: 行，我能干！保证跟这人自己的亲手写的一样！

String.Source: Yes, I can do that! It will be as if this person penned it with his own hand!
String.Dest: 行，我能干！保证跟这人自己的亲手写的一样！

String.Source: In fact, if he's not a member of court, I don't even need a seal! Just lead the way.
String.Dest: 事实上，如果他不是宫廷成员的话，我甚至连印章都不需要！来吧。

String.Source: In fact, if he's not a member of court, I don't even need a seal! Just lead the way.
String.Dest: 事实上，如果他不是宫廷成员的话，我甚至连印章都不需要！来吧。

String.Source: Thank you, hero. Sunken-Roots is but your humble servant! I will do whatever you ask, but if I may make a suggestion, my main talent is forgery.
String.Dest: 感谢你，英雄。在下桑肯·树根是你忠诚的仆人！不管你让我做什么都可以，但若要我提建议的话，我最擅长的是伪造文件。

String.Source: I was talking about your friend. You still...(sigh). Alright, you win. I was a fool to think you would ever pay anyway.
String.Dest: 当时我正在谈论你的朋友。你还…（叹）。行，你赢了。我居然傻到以为你真的会付账。

String.Source: And for this I should be grateful? You're half the reason I'm in here! Or have you forgotten that fake decree I made for you?
String.Dest: 所以我该谢谢你吗？我落到这儿来可有你一半儿的原因！你忘了我替你造的领主令了吗？

String.Source: You! Your companion is rotten, but you are a sensible, decent person! Please, you must help me!
String.Dest: 这位！您的同伴是坏家伙，但您肯定有同情心，是个好人哪！拜托了，您得帮帮我！

String.Source: In any event, I will forge this document, as promised. Now, looking at this list, we want to mirror this bard's irreverence.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我会把这份文书改好的，说话算数嘛。现在，看看这个清单吧，我们得再现出这位诗人的【不恭。

String.Source: The bandits had me make bounties from the Steward, to get people to hunt a vigilante.
String.Dest: 这些强盗让我假造一张总管的悬赏令，要人们去追捕一个警戒者。

String.Source: If you take me to a cabin where my things are kept, I can forge you a decree that will allow you to collect taxes, or anything of the sort!
String.Dest: 如果你把我带到放我东西的小木屋，我甚至能帮你伪造一封官文拿去收税！

String.Source: The bandits were using me to do just that, to get a bounty on a lawman that was thinning their numbers.
String.Dest: 土匪们一直让我做这类事情，把那个一直在削弱他们的队伍的治安官搞成通缉犯。

String.Source: There was some vigilante they wanted dead. But I can make different letters for you. Any forgery you wish, I can make!
String.Dest: 以前是做些通缉令去害死那些他们讨厌的警戒者。但我可以给你一封不同的信。你所想要伪造的任何文件，我都可以帮你做出来！

String.Source: Y-your bandit camp? No, please, I can't live like this. I will do anything you ask, I will forge many documents, but let me out of this cage!
String.Dest: 你…你的强盗营地？不，不要, 我不要再过这样的日子了。无论什么我都可以照办，我可以伪造各种文件，但请先放我出来！

String.Source: In fact, not to sound ungrateful, because you saved my life, but it's probably better if we pretend we've never met. Us being accomplices and all.
String.Dest: 其实呢，我不是说忘恩负义的话哈，毕竟你救了我的命，但咱们若能装作从未谋面的话会更好。忘掉这次合作的事儿，和所有一切吧。

String.Source: No! Please! Take me with you!
String.Dest: 不！求你了！带我出去吧！

String.Source: Alright, there we have it. A perfect forgery. Now, if you two are on your way to Markarth, I'll be headed in the other direction.
String.Dest: 好啦，拿着吧。绝对完美的【炮制。那，你俩现在要是去马卡斯城，我就往相反方向走啦。

String.Source: The only reason the guard were able to arrest my father is because he was forced to spend the night in Solitude.
String.Dest: 守卫逮捕我父亲唯一可行的理由就是他非自愿而不得不在独孤城过了一夜。
